panels.title: Total SST Files Size By Task (Stacked)

targets.expr: sum by(path) (disk_total_bytes{pod="$instance", application_id="$cluster", cluster="$k8s"}) - sum by(path) (disk_free_bytes{pod="$instance", application_id="$cluster", cluster="$k8s"})

sum by(method) (grpc_server_processing_duration_seconds_sum{pod="$instance", application_id="$cluster", cluster="$k8s"}) / sum by(method) (grpc_server_processing_duration_seconds_count{pod="$instance", application_id="$cluster", cluster="$k8s"})
